scripts.dev: nodemon --watch './**/*.ts' --ignore './build/**' --ext ts --exec 'npm run grpc:generate && npm run build && node ./build/index.js'
scripts.build: npm run grpc:generate && rm -rf ./build && tsc --build tsconfig.json
scripts.grpc:generate: shx mkdir -p grpc-gen && npx grpc_tools_node_protoc --plugin=./node_modules/.bin/protoc-gen-ts_proto --ts_proto_out=./grpc-gen --ts_proto_opt=env=node,outputServices=nice-grpc,outputServices=generic-definitions,useExactTypes=false,useAsyncIterable=false,importSuffix=.js,snakeToCamel=false --proto_path=./applications/minotari_app_grpc/proto/ base_node.proto
